[Home](index.html) &gt; <a href="browser-logs.html">@datadog/browser-logs</a> &gt; <a href="browser-logs.logsinitconfiguration.html">LogsInitConfiguration</a> &gt; <a href="browser-logs.logsinitconfiguration.forwardconsolelogs.html">forwardConsoleLogs</a>

## LogsInitConfiguration.forwardConsoleLogs property

Forward logs from console.\* to Datadog. Use "all" to forward everything or an array of console API names to forward only a subset.

**Signature:**

```typescript
forwardConsoleLogs?: ConsoleApiName[] | 'all' | undefined;
```
